title: Polytechnic student commits suicide
body: A 24-year-old polytechnic student committed suicide by hanging himself at Arnab Hostel in the Vocational Mor area of Kurigram on Saturday evening. The deceased was identified as Mrityunjoy Roy, a final year Diploma student in Civil Engineering department of Kurigram Government Polytechnic Institute, who hailed from Kaliganj Upazila of Lalmonirhat district. Abul Kalam Azad, sub-inspector of Kurigram Police station, said that the initial investigation report indicates suicide. The body was sent for autopsy and a case was being processed. Locals and police said Mrityunjoy married two years ago after a love affair, but his in-laws never accepted the marriage and legal disputes followed, and he was eventually divorced by his wife under her familyâ€™s pressure, leaving him mentally distressed. Ariful Islam, controller of Arnab Hostel, said that most students had gone home after exams, leaving only three on the premises and as Mrityunjoy did not respond to repeated calls, Ariful broke a window and found him hanging.
